page.title: 11SOCIAL CONCERNS-NORTH BRENT
page.content: Generally {North Brent}is pleasant and safe but there is a growing problem of graffitti on walls and {vandalism} in{ {parks. Assaults} on people both in the street and at home for money are increasing.Armed raids on banks and post offices occur every few weeks with the possibility of local shoppers being injured. There is a problem of { {racism} sometimes in North Brent. Jewish people are occasionally threatened or synagogues damaged. One Jewish School in this area has to have very stringent {security prescautions} to try to prevent the entry of unwanted visitors. There exists much local opposition to the building of a Hindu Temple in Northwick Park mainly because of destruction of open space and increased traffic causing difficulties for the hospital.
